title: Get it on
author: VD
content_html:
Eqquus Pallidus and the Topical Omnivore intend to debate evolution as well. Specifically, they are discussing this:

“By recourse only to Physics, Mathematics, and Logic, the existence of the universe requires, as a prerequisite, the existence of the God described by Christian scripture, rather than any other God, gods, or no god at all.”

Given EP’s history of posting here, I have no idea whether it will be a coherent discussion or an incomprehensible train wreck, but it will almost surely be entertaining in one way or another. I’m personally more than a little skeptical of this tact, but I remain open to the possibilities.
content_text:
Eqquus Pallidus and the Topical Omnivore
intend to debate evolution as well
.  Specifically, they are discussing this:
“By recourse only to Physics, Mathematics, and Logic, the existence of the universe requires, as a prerequisite, the existence of the God described by Christian scripture, rather than any other God, gods, or no god at all.”
Given EP’s history of posting here, I have no idea whether it will be a coherent discussion or an incomprehensible train wreck, but it will almost surely be entertaining in one way or another.  I’m personally more than a little skeptical of this tact, but I remain open to the possibilities.
